article_title: The ACA and Other Changes to Watch Out for This Tax Season
article_text:
The complexity and questions that arise from the nation’s ever-changing tax laws are as certain as taxes themselves. So we introduce a new column, written by Tom Herman, a former tax columnist for The Wall Street Journal, that will look at developments affecting taxpayers and individual investors. We welcome your thoughts and questions about tax issues, big and small. Send them to reports@wsj.com.

Early birds, be careful.

...

twitter.description: Tax season could get trickier for some because of the Affordable Care Act. Here’s what you need to know.
twitter.title: The ACA and Other Changes to Watch Out for This Tax Season

article_summary:
The complexity and questions that arise from the nation’s ever-changing tax laws are as certain as taxes themselves.
We welcome your thoughts and questions about tax issues, big and small.
So we introduce a new column, written by Tom Herman, a former tax columnist for The Wall Street Journal, that will look at developments affecting taxpayers and individual investors.
Early birds, be careful.
Send them to reports@wsj.com.
